text.headline: Career Experience
text.text: A summary of professional roles and accomplishments.

text.headline: PRINCIPAL ENGINEER (DATA & ML)
text.text:
Company: DARVIS
January 2022 – Present
Developed sophisticated computer vision and machine learning solutions for real-time analytics across logistics, retail, and healthcare industries, while also managing teams effectively and overseeing the integration of Large Language Models for enhanced data analytics capabilities.

text.headline: SENIOR ENGINEER (DATA & ML)
text.text:
Company: DARVIS
June 2018 – December 2021
Developed advanced computer vision and machine learning systems. Proficient in object detection, tracking, classification, and more. Skilled in Big Data processing with Apache Spark, Hadoop. Integrated LLMS for enhanced data insights. Improved system performance using Deepstream SDK and TensorRT. Led development of an in-house annotation tool. Managed and guided teams effectively.

text.headline: SENIOR DATA ENGINEER
text.text:
Company: PERSONTYLE
January 2017 – May 2018
Consulted and trained in Big Data technology and Machine Learning. Developed modules using open-source Big Data solutions. Expertise in Blockchain, real-time data processing for Agro Industries.

text.headline: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
text.text:
Company: EBRYX
March 2016 – December 2016
Evaluated and derived insights from data. Developed real-time dashboards for data interpretation.

text.headline: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
text.text:
Company: PREDICTIFY ME
December 2014 – February 2016
Created a platform for analyzing and strategizing information from various resources.
